Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:breasts) right breast covered in $(this.appearance:fur) $(this.appearance:fur-color) fur.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A right cheek.|A right $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheek.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A right ear.|A right $(this.appearance:earshape) ear.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A right earlobe.|A right $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobe.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A right eyebrow.|A right $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrow.}
Ordinary eyelashes over a right eye.
A set of five right fingernails.
A set of right fingers, with nails at the ends.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A right hand.|A $(this.appearance:hands) right hand.}
A right index finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a right index finger.
A normal human's right index fingertip.
A right middle finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a right middle finger.
A normal human's right middle fingertip.
The little finger on a right hand, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a right pinky finger.
A pupil of the right eye.
A right ring finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a right ring finger.
The triangular bone across the upper right back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
The right side, between the right ribs and the right waist.
The sole of a right foot.
A right temple, on the side of the forehead.
A fingernail, at the end of a right thumb finger.
